about_the_game:
In Arabia Builder you will get the chance to prove yourself as the most skilled artisan in the medieval Middle East. Repair and decorate houses, tend to beautiful gardens and make the royal palace truly fit for a sultan!

From a village to the palace

Climb the social ladder and advance from a provincial craftsman tasked with caring for a remote village to the famous urban artisan building and repairing intricate residences, palaces and sites. Plant trees in the calm courtyard gardens and clean ancient fountains.

Customize the whole building

Experiment with different exterior and interior decorations and styles. Go wild with decor or create striking and minimalistic rooms and facades.

Redesign everything

Don’t like the atrocious design of some of the buildings? Destroy them and build something marvellous instead!

Create a new Wonder of the Ancient World

Experiment with designs of interiors and gardens. Make the sultan proud and who knows, maybe you will become a builder of a new Wonder of the World.
